title: Group Technical Effects
text: GTE model quantifies batch effects individual genes single-cell data.

title: Group Technical Effects
text: run GTEs package, install GitHub devtools directly:

title: Group Technical Effects
text: See usage examples. Group technical effects calculation highly batch-sensitive genes (HBGs) selection

title: Group Technical Effects
text: GTEs successfully installed used Windows, Linux Mac OS (R version >= 4.0.2).

what: Compute the group technical effects. — Run.GroupTechEffects
title: Compute the group technical effects. — Run.GroupTechEffects
text: Compute group technical effects.

title: Compute the group technical effects. — Run.GroupTechEffects
code: Run.GroupTechEffects(X, meta, g_factor, b_factor, do.scale = F)

title: Compute the group technical effects. — Run.GroupTechEffects
text: X Input data matrix. meta Input metadata (data.frame). g_factor Group variable (s). b_factor Batch variable (s). .scale Whether perform scaling.

title: Compute the group technical effects. — Run.GroupTechEffects
text: list containing overall GTE ($OverallTechEffects) GTE ($GroupTechEffects) subgroup group variable.

title: Compute the group technical effects. — Run.GroupTechEffects
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # X is a normalized expression matrix with rows representing genes and columns representing cells. # meta is a data.frame with columns containing metadata such as cell type, batch, etc. GTE_ct <- Run.GroupTechEffects(X, meta, g_factor = "CellType", bg_factor = c("Batch", "CellType")) } # }

title: Scale data matrix — scale_data
code: scale_data(   data.x,   do.center = T,   do.scale = T,   row.means = NULL,   row.sds = NULL )

title: Scale data matrix — scale_data
text: data.x Input data matrix. .center Whether center row values. (default TRUE) .scale Whether scale row values. (default TRUE) row.means provided row means center. (default NULL) row.sds provided row standard deviations scale. (default NULL)
